title: Anchors
description: Internal anchors render using the reach Routers Link component
Navigation links add a 'current' class to make styling easy
Default links use the HTML 'a' tag and are not connected to the router

propsData.name: linkType
propsData.description: Will default to external if not used

propsData.name: path
propsData.description: The path the anchor links to

propsData.name: anchorClass
propsData.description: A custom class to enable custom anchor styling

propsData.name: disabled
propsData.description: Adds a disabled class to the anchor making it disbaled, removes click actions

propsData.name: children
propsData.description: The content of an anchor, usually the label but can be any element

propsData.name: rel
propsData.description: Use this to add the relationship of the linked resource
